pages.text: $(li)The Sticky Piston is a variant of the $(l:patchouli:redstone/vanilla/piston)Piston$(/l).$(br)$(li)It works as the Pistons, but can also pull the block on its face back when it retracts.
$(li)This item can be used to craft a $(l:patchouli:redstone/supplementaries/spring_launcher)Spring Launcher$(/l) in a $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/crafting_table)Crafting Table$(/l).
